channel.title: [ANY BASE] SKin color
channel.description:
Ok guys im releasing this because this community helped me so much i want to help you <3 Rep if you want <3
What you are adding: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7csbpHrzNCQ&feature=youtube_gdata]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7csbpHrzNCQ&feature=youtube_gdata[/url]
[IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/2-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/6.png[/img]
Go into client.java
and Find: [QUOTE]static final int[][] anIntArrayArray1003 = {[/QUOTE]
Then replace the whole of that Array with this: [QUOTE] static final int[][] anIntArrayArray1003 = { { 6798, 107, 10283, 16, 4797, 7744, 5799, 4634, 33697, 22433, 2983, 54193 }, { 8741, 12, 64030, 43162, 7735, 8404, 1701, 38430, 24094, 10153, 56621, 4783, 1341, 16578, 35003, 25239 }, { 25238, 8742, 12, 64030, 43162, 7735, 8404, 1701, 38430, 24094, 10153, 56621, 4783, 1341, 16578, 35003 }, { 4626, 11146, 6439, 12, 4758, 10270 }, { 4550, 20165, 43678, 16895 ,28416 ,12231 ,947 ,60359, 32433 } };[/QUOTE]
<3<3 (u)
credits: 10% me 10% sam 80% mopar :P

item.title: [ANY BASE] SKin color
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

Ok guys im releasing this because this community helped me so much i want to help you <3 Rep if you want <3

What you are adding:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7csbpHrzNCQ&feature=youtube_gdata

Go into client.java

and Find:

static final int[][] anIntArrayArray1003 = {

Then replace the whole of that Array with this:

[QUOTE] static final int[][] anIntArrayArray1003 = {
{ 6798, 107, 10283, 16, 4797, 7744, 5799, 4634, 33697, 22433, 2983,
54193 },
{ 8741, 12, 64030, 43162, 7735, 8404, 1701, 38430, 24094, 10153,
56621, 4783, 1341, 16578, 35003, 25239 },
{ 25238, 8742, 12, 64030, 43162, 7735, 8404, 1701, 38430, 24094,
10153, 56621, 4783, 1341, 16578, 35003 },
{ 4626, 11146, 6439, 12, 4758, 10270 },
{ 4550, 20165, 43678, 16895 ,28416 ,12231 ,947 ,60359, 32433 } };[/QUOTE]
